properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 8 at 2:15PM PST until January 9 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, north winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts
up to 40 kt and seas 13 to 17 feet expected. For the Small
Craft Advisory, southwest winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30
kt and seas 9 to 12 feet.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 3 AM to 3 PM PST Thursday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 3 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST THURSDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 3 PM PST THURSDAY
